title: Did Hillary Clinton Say ‘I Would Like to See People Like Donald Trump Run for Office’?
subtitle: “In fact, when you say businessmen and women, I can’t help but think of a particular one that I would just love to see running for the presidency at some point in the future."
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Hillary Clinton suggested during a 2013 speech that she would like to see Donald Trump run for President.
